meta.title: Complete Competitive Programming Masterclass - From Beginner to Grandmaster
meta.description: The most comprehensive 6-month competitive programming program. Master algorithms, data structures, problem-solving techniques, and compete in international contests. From zero to Codeforces Expert/Master level.
meta.level: Complete Beginner to Expert Competitive Programmer

program_overview.title: Complete Competitive Programming Masterclass
program_overview.tagline: From Zero to Contest Champion in 6 Months
program_overview.description:
This intensive 6-month program transforms beginners into expert competitive programmers capable of competing in top-tier programming contests. Master every algorithm, data structure, and problem-solving technique used in competitive programming.

You'll solve 1000+ problems, participate in 100+ contests, learn advanced algorithms, master dynamic programming, conquer graph theory, and develop the speed and accuracy needed for top rankings. By completion, you'll be ready for ICPC, Google Code Jam, and achieve high ratings on platforms like Codeforces and CodeChef.
what_makes_this_different: Start from absolute basics with C++ STL
1000+ carefully curated problems with video editorials

learning_path.phase_1: Foundation (Months 1-2): C++ STL, Basic DS/Algo, Easy Problems
learning_path.phase_2: Intermediate (Months 3-4): Advanced DS, DP, Graphs, Mathematics
learning_path.phase_3: Advanced (Months 5-6): Expert Algorithms, Optimization, Contest Mastery

phase_1_foundation.title: PHASE 1: Foundation & Problem Solving Basics (Months 1-2, Weeks 1-8)
phase_1_foundation.description: Build strong foundations in C++ STL, basic algorithms, and develop problem-solving mindset.

week_1_2.title: C++ STL & Fast I/O
topics: C++ STL containers: vector, set, map, queue, stack
STL algorithms: sort, binary_search, lower_bound, upper_bound

week_9_10.title: Number Theory Fundamentals
topics: Prime numbers and sieve of Eratosthenes

week_17.title: Phase 1 Assessment
week_17.assessment: Phase 1 Exam - Solve 5 problems in 2 hours

week_26.title: Phase 2 Assessment
week_26.assessment: Phase 2 Exam - Solve 4 problems in 2.5 hours

phase_2_frontend_mastery.title: PHASE 2: Advanced Algorithms & Contest Strategy (Months 3-4, Weeks 9-17)
phase_2_frontend_mastery.description: Master advanced algorithms, dynamic programming patterns, and develop contest-winning strategies.

week_51.title: Platform-Specific Mastery
topics: Google competitions: Kick Start, Code Jam

phase_3_backend_engineering.title: PHASE 3: Expert Level & Specializations (Months 5-6, Weeks 18-26)
phase_3_backend_engineering.description: Master expert-level algorithms, specialized topics, and achieve competitive programming excellence.

phase_4_advanced_production.title: ELITE TRACK: Beyond Expert Level
phase_4_advanced_production.description: Optional advanced paths for those aiming for the absolute top

week_104.title: Future Roadmap
week_104.assessment: LIFETIME MEMBERSHIP - Continuous updates and elite community access

projects_throughout_course: Phase 1: CP Template Library, Algorithm Visualizer, Contest Tracker
Phase 2: Advanced DS Library, DP Solver, Graph Algorithm Suite
Phase 3: Complete CP Framework, Problem Generator, Contest Platform
Final: 1000+ Problems Solved, Expert Rating Achievement, Teaching Platform
skills_mastered: Languages: C++ (Expert), STL Mastery, Java/Python for CP
Data Structures: 50+ data structures from basic to advanced
Mathematics: Number Theory, Combinatorics, Linear Algebra, FFT
Problem Solving: 1000+ problems across all platforms
Contest Skills: Speed coding, debugging, optimization, hacking
Platforms: Codeforces, CodeChef, AtCoder, TopCoder, ICPC
Advanced: Research algorithms, approximation, randomized algorithms
Soft Skills: Team coordination, teaching, problem setting
